game_statuses.description: Fully developed and ready to play

games.title: Space Clicker - Phaser Edition
games.description: An engaging space-themed clicker game built with Phaser 3! Click the rocket to increase your score.
games.author: Ggameplatform

games.title: Rainbow Rush
games.description: Rush through colorful levels in this fast-paced arcade game!
games.author: Platform Team

games.title: Blocky Road
games.description: Cross the blockchain! Navigate through a procedurally generated world filled with crypto vehicles, floating platforms, and blockchain trains. Collect Bitcoin coins and avoid obstacles in this addictive infinite runner inspired by Crossy Road!
games.author: Ggameplatform

games.title: Bouncing Balls
games.description: A fun physics-based game where you bounce balls and score points!
games.author: Platform Team

status.description: Fully developed and ready to play

games.title: Seven ‚Äî 7 √® in mezzo
games.description: Gioco di dadi elegante e professionale con grafica 3D. Punta Sopra o Sotto 7, lancia due dadi e metti alla prova la tua fortuna! Design responsive e animazioni fluide per un'esperienza di gioco coinvolgente.
games.author: Cur8

games.title: Briscola
games.description: Il classico gioco di carte italiano! Gioca contro l'AI con 3 livelli di difficolt√†, sfida un amico in locale, o gioca online in multiplayer. Ottimizzato per mobile.
games.author: Cur8

games.title: Sky Tower
games.description: Build the highest tower you can! Stack blocks perfectly to reach the sky. Perfect alignment keeps blocks full size and earns combo bonuses.
games.author: GamePlatform Team

games.title: Survivor Arena
games.description: Survive waves of enemies in a seamless toroidal arena! Collect weapons, level up, and face increasingly difficult hordes. How long can you survive?
games.author: GamePlatform Team
